title: Nights of Azure + Update 1
body:
Nights of Azure + Update 1


Genres/Tags: RPG, Third-person, 3D, Japanese
Companies: Gust / Koei Tecmo Games
Languages: ENG
Original Size: 4.9 GB
Repack Size: 2.4 GB

 

Download Mirrors

  • ExtraTorrent / Kickass Torrents [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • FreeTorrents
  • Tapochek.net [magnet]
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable)
  • Filehoster: MEGA.nz (Uploaded by John07, compatible with torrent)
  • Filehoster: We4Load (Uploaded by Theprocss69, not compatible with MultiUpload)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Nights.of.Azure-CODEX ISO release: codex-nights.of.azure.iso (5,247,860,736 bytes)
  • Update 1 applied, alternative ALI213 crack is available in NoDVD folder after installation
  • Fix for old 1/2-core CPUs available in the same NoDVD folder after installation
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 4.9 to 2.4 GB)
  • Installation takes 3-10 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 6 GB
  • Repack uses pZlib library by Razor12911

Game Description

Save the world or the life of one girl… I decide my destiny!

The world was once ruled by the Nightlord. In that world lived a Saint, destined to become a sacrifice to the Nightlord, and a Holy Knight, with the power to use Servans.
The meeting of the girls changed the fate of the world.

Take your Servans and fight accross “The Land Without Night” for the one you love!

Included DLCs

  • GUST-chan, the Servan
  • An additional map, “Tokoyami no Kairou”
  • An additional episode, “Tsuioku no Kioku”
